name: October Issue 2013
description:
COAZ Magazine September Issue 2013 

Introducing the Japonica Issue!  
The new digital magazine offers women worldwide the latest trends, whimsical stories, distinctive beauty features, guides to hidden treasures and much more. The digital magazine is fully interactive, allowing readers to visit hyperlinks without leaving the pages of COAZ. 

The pages of COAZ include high fashion editorials with purchasable one-off fashion content & products from the online boutique via worldwide delivery. 
The magazine is currently on interactive PDF format, which users are able to use on iBooks on either their iPad or iPhone. Android users can view the magazine as well. Magazine can also be viewed on any computer via Adobe Acrobat.

How to purchase/use:

Purchase procedure is effortless. You simple add the magazine to your cart, proceed with the checkout (note there are NO delivery charges on the magazine) and a confirmation email with a download link will be sent to you within few minutes.

You then have to click the download link provided with your order email and it will automatically download it on your device 
All pink texts are active links, all editorial images are active links and all by-lines are active links.

If you’re experiencing any technical problems, have any questions or concerns, please contact the COAZ team at coaz@zinahns.com and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

name: September Issue 2013
description:

The new digital magazine offers women worldwide the latest trends, whimsical stories, distinctive beauty features, guides to hidden treasures and much more. The digital magazine is fully interactive, allowing readers to visit hyperlinks without leaving the pages of COAZ.

name: Shinku
description:
Shinku Scarf 

20% OFF SALE 
Before: £29.99

The Shinku scarf if part of the ZINAH Limited Edition Promo Collection. The designer has always been highly fond of flowers, particularly those of crimson colour. Having fine art as a background, these digitally printed flowers are originally in watercolour, inspired by the delicacy of Japanese roses. The name means nothing other than ‘crimson’ in Japanese.

This silk/cotton blend scarf is the perfect statement piece for a feminine look or simply adding a bit of summer to any outfit. 

Brand:

ZINAH

Composition:

50% Silk
50% Cotton

Care Label:

Handwash Max 30°C
Do Not Bleach
Iron at 110°C MAX
Dry Clean with Perchloroethylene 
Do Not Tumble Dry

Size: 

Width 75cm
Length 200cm

name: Suisaiga
description:
Suisaiga Scarf

20% OFF SALE 
Before: £35.99

The Suisaiga scarf if part of the ZINAH Limited Edition Promo Collection. 
The Suisaiga scarf (watercolour in Japanese) if part of the ZINAH Limited Edition Promo Collection. Another watercolour digitally printed scarf, but this time on textured silk or otherwise known as jacquard. 

Brand:

ZINAH

Composition:

100% Jacquard Silk

Care Label:

Handwash Max 30°C
Do Not Bleach
Iron at 110°C MAX
Dry Clean with Perchloroethylene 
Do Not Tumble Dry

Size: 

Width 75cm
Length 200cm

name: Aoi
description:
Aoi Scarf 

20% OFF SALE 
Before: £16.99

The Aoi scarf if part of the ZINAH Limited Edition Promo Collection. Aoi is short for Aoi Hana, meaning blue flower in Japanese. This square digitally printed cotton scarf suits any occasion, particularly for casual looks.

Brand:

ZINAH

Composition:

100% Cotton

Care Label:

Machine-wash  Max 30°C
Do Not Bleach
Iron at 110°C MAX
Dry Clean with Perchloroethylene 
Do Not Tumble Dry

Size:

Length 125cm
